entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016
